content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area (around position 0,0)
Consists of two furnaces:
- Stone furnace at (0,0) processing iron ore to plates
- Stone furnace at (2,0) processing iron ore to plates

### Copper Plate Production Area (around position 4,4)
- Stone furnace at (4,4) processing copper ore to plates

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (around position 9,11)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest at (6.5,11.5) containing iron plates and copper cables
- Burner inserter at (7.5,11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine 1 at (9.5,11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (11.5,11.5) moving finished circuits to output chest
- Output wooden chest at (12.5,11.5) storing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (around position -7,24)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5,24.5) providing water
- Pipe network connecting water from pump to boiler
- Boiler at (-7.0,24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam pipe network connecting boiler to engine
- Steam engine at (-2.5,24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

### Research Area (around position 0,30)
Consists of:
- Lab (position not directly specified but connected to steam engine)
- Burner inserter at (0.5,30.5) feeding science packs
- Storage chest at (0.5,31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Crafting errors for items requiring machines
- Copper plates and copper cables cannot be manually crafted - they require furnaces or assembling machines
- Ensure required production facilities are set up before attempting to craft items needing machines

### Resource shortage errors
- Assembling machine shows ITEM_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE status - ensure consistent supply of required materials
- Monitor and maintain fuel levels in burner devices before they run out completely

### Production chain issues
- Electronic circuit production is stalling due to copper cable shortages
- Ensure all components in production chains have adequate input materials
